text: Suddenly, Last Summer is a 1959 British American psychological drama movie directed by Joseph L. Mankiewicz and based on the play of the same name by Tennessee Williams. It stars Elizabeth Taylor, Katharine Hepburn, Montgomery Clift, Albert Dekker and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1960. ==Other websites== * * Category:1959 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:British drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Joseph L. title: Suddenly, Last Summer
